20101207023548.667|20101207023550.333|CCO|CANCER AS WELL.
20101207023550.333|20101207023552.000|CCO|>> WHAT WE FOUND WAS IN THE 
20101207023552.000|20101207023553.667|CCO|TRIALS WHERE PEOPLE HAVE TAKEN 
20101207023553.667|20101207023555.333|CCO|ASPIRIN FOUR, FIVE, SIX, SEVEN 
20101207023555.333|20101207023557.000|CCO|YEARS ON AVERAGE, THE RISK OF 
20101207023557.000|20101207023558.667|CCO|DYING OF CANCER WAS REDUCED BY 
20101207023558.667|20101207023600.333|CCO|ABOUT 25%.
20101207023600.333|20101207023602.000|CCO|>> Reporter: IN OTHER WORDS, FOR
20101207023602.000|20101207023603.667|CCO|EVERY 1,000 PEOPLE WHO TOOK 
20101207023603.667|20101207023605.333|CCO|ASPIRIN EVERY DAY FOR AT LEAST 
20101207023605.333|20101207023607.000|CCO|FOUR YEARS, 23 ENDED UP DYING 
20101207023607.000|20101207023608.667|CCO|FROM CANCER.
20101207023608.667|20101207023610.333|CCO|THAT COMPARES TO 30 WHO DIED 
20101207023610.333|20101207023612.000|CCO|FROM CANCER IN THE GROUP NOT 
20101207023612.000|20101207023613.667|CCO|TAKING DAILY ASPIRIN.
20101207023613.667|20101207023615.333|CCO|THE ASPIRIN WAS FOUND TO REDUCE 
20101207023615.333|20101207023617.000|CCO|THE DEATH RATE FOR AN ARRAY OF 
20101207023617.000|20101207023618.667|CCO|CANCERS INCLUDING COLON, LUNG 
20101207023618.667|20101207023620.333|CCO|AND ESOPHAGUS.
20101207023620.333|20101207023622.000|CCO|THE MOST DRAMATIC DECREASE WAS 
20101207023622.000|20101207023624.000|CCO|IN GASTROINTESTINAL CANCER.
20101207023624.000|20101207023626.000|CCO|FOR EVERY 46 PEOPLE WHO TOOK 
20101207023626.000|20101207023628.000|CCO|ASPIRIN EVERY DAY FOR FIVE 
20101207023628.000|20101207023630.000|CCO|YEARS, ONE LIFE WAS SAVED.
20101207023630.000|20101207023632.000|CCO|BUT THERE ARE RISKS THAT MUST BE
20101207023632.000|20101207023633.667|CCO|CONSIDERED.
20101207023633.667|20101207023635.333|CCO|WHAT ARE THE POSSIBLE SIDE 
20101207023635.333|20101207023637.000|CCO|EFFECTS FROM ASPIRIN?
20101207023637.000|20101207023638.667|CCO|>> THE MOST IMPORTANT SIDE 
20101207023638.667|20101207023640.333|CCO|EFFECTS ARE BLEEDING, STOMACH 
20101207023640.333|20101207023642.000|CCO|BLEEDING AND STROKE.
20101207023642.000|20101207023644.000|CCO|THEY ARE POTENTIALLY LETHAL. 
20101207023644.000|20101207023646.000|CCO|>> Reporter: FOR JOY CANE, 
20101207023646.000|20101207023648.000|CCO|ALREADY TAKING ASPIRIN TO 
20101207023648.000|20101207023650.000|CCO|PREVENT HEART DISEASE, TODAY'S 
20101207023650.000|20101207023652.000|CCO|STUDY IS WELCOME NEWS. 
20101207023652.000|20101207023653.111|CCO|>> HOORAY, THAT'S HOW I FEEL. 
20101207023653.111|20101207023654.222|CCO|>> SO WHAT DOES EVERYONE AT HOME
20101207023654.222|20101207023655.333|CCO|DO NOW IF THEY HAVE IT SITTING 
20101207023655.333|20101207023656.444|CCO|IN THEIR CABINET OR IF THEY WANT
20101207023656.444|20101207023657.556|CCO|TO GO BUY IT?
20101207023657.556|20101207023658.667|CCO|>> THIS IS -- IT'S EXCITING.
20101207023658.667|20101207023659.778|CCO|IF YOU HAVE HEART DISEASE, 
20101207023659.778|20101207023700.889|CCO|HERE'S ANOTHER REASON THAT YOU

20101207023723.818|20101207023724.727|CCO|>> ALL RIGHT,

20101207024238.000|20101207024240.000|CCO|>> WELL, IT DEPENDS WHAT YOU'RE

20101207024247.556|20101207024248.667|CCO|>> Reporter: I'M TALKING ABOUT 
20101207024248.667|20101207024249.778|CCO|THE TOP LEVEL.
20101207024249.778|20101207024250.889|CCO|>> 2 DOZEN.
20101207024250.889|20101207024252.000|CCO|WELL, YOU KNOW, IN IRAQ, WE 
20101207024252.000|20101207024253.667|CCO|NEVER RECONCILED WITH THE TOP 
20101207024253.667|20101207024255.333|CCO|LEVEL AL QAEDA IN IRAQ LEADERS.

20101207025007.333|20101207025008.000|CCO|ADVAIR won't replace fast-acting
